name: 施欣文
objective: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
schedule:
See the hard-copy syllabus for more detail. 

Like last semester, students will have assigned readings each week and vocabulary quizzes. Students will actively participate in class by conversing and making presentations. Many of the readings this semester will have a more literary focus than last semester. We will look at some great conversations in literature in addition to our more regular fare of podcasts and informative articles.
scorePolicy:
30%　　Presentations (graded on criteria such as clarity, fluency, originality, creativity, and effort)
30%　　Reading and Vocabulary Quizzes
25%　　Participation & English spoken (in student-led discussions, whole-class activities, etc.) 
10%　　Final Oral Exam/Improvisation 
5%　　Final Stems Quiz
